schedule_setup_h.intro_Txt: This page allows you to set up schedules to be used as events.
schedule_setup_h.daily_Txt2: Name - Enter a descriptive name for the schedule.
schedule_setup_h.daily_Txt4: Start time/End time - Enter the hour and minute for the start and end times (hh:mm).
schedule_setup_h.daily_Txt5: Days - Specify the days of the week the event will be active by checking the appropriate boxes.
schedule_setup_h.week_Txt2: Name - Enter a descriptive name for the schedule.
schedule_setup_h.week_Txt4: Start time/End time - Select the day from the drop-down list and enter the hour and minute for the start and end times (hh:mm).
schedule_setup_h.month_Txt2: Name - Enter a descriptive name for the schedule.
schedule_setup_h.month_Txt4: Start time/End time - Enter the date, hour and minute for the start and end times (hh:mm).
schedule_setup_h.month_Txt5: Months - Specify the months the event will be active by checking the appropriate boxes.
schedule_setup_h.yearly_Txt2: Name - Enter a descriptive name for the schedule.
schedule_setup_h.yearly_Txt4: Start time/End time - Enter the month from the drop-down list, enter the date, hour and minute for the start and end times (hh:mm).

schedules_h.intro_Txt: This page lists the schedules that have already been created. Predefined schedules are listed in blue.
schedules_h.list_txt1: Name - The name entered by the user or of the predefined schedule.
schedules_h.list_txt2: To create a new schedule, click Add... To change an existing schedule, select it in the list and click Modify... To delete a schedule, select it and click Remove.
schedules_h.link_txt: See Schedule Setup for more information on how to set Schedules.
